content: You can still find another Clay Vajra to battle at the foot of the main stairs. It's a tougher fight than the previous one, and you'll be rewarded for besting it with the Clay Vajra Spirit to add to your collection.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
You can still find another Clay Vajra to battle at the foot of the main stairs. It's a tougher fight than the previous one, and you'll be rewarded for besting it with the Clay Vajra Spirit to add to your collection.
